mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_comment (comment_idx, userid, board_idx, comments) VALUES (comment_idx.nextval, #{userid}, #{board_idx}, #{comments})
mapper.select: select comment_idx, userid, reg_date, update_date, board_idx, comments from free_comment where board_idx = #{board_idx} order by comment_idx DESC

SELECT comment_idx, board_idx, comments, userid, reg_date, update_date FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(free_comment XPK자유게시판_댓글) */ rownum rn, comment_idx, board_idx, comments, userid, reg_date, update_date FROM free_comment WHERE board_idx = #{board_idx} AND comment_idx > 0 AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT count(comment_idx) FROM free_comment WHERE board_idx = #{board_idx}
